review: I had been visiting many Gynec Dr in Bangalore for the past 2 years as I had non stop hip and stomach pain.  Finally I met Dr.Reetu G Naresh in Apollo. She did all her diagonosis and did few tests and nailed the issue. Since i had polyps in my uterus, i was having pain n later on spotting. Few days ago I had Hysteroectomy and I have recovered in a week. Today I went for a review and Dr confirmed that I am perfectly recovering n have no aches. I am very sensitive to pain n I m happily writing this review as I have recovered from all pain n aches. Thanks to this Dr for being so kind and understanding throughout this treatment journey with her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
M very very happy with Dr reetu g naresh she is very friendly with patients. She helped me to deliver normal when I have undergone c.section in my first delivery I think it was impossible but she helped me to make it possible. It was more then my expectations I can't believe like this doctors also available . M thankful to God bcs I met Dr reetu 
God bless her.❤️

Did not have a good experience ** *** ****** ******* ** ******* *********** ***** *** ************ ********** ** ****** ***** *** ***** ****** ******** Furthermore, I was told that I am old in terms of my biological clock. I am in my late 20s and do not wish to have children, nor do I need to be berated for my choices. The experience would've been better had the discussion been purely medical, with an explanation of the procedure being performed and it's reason. I understand with the volume of patients this may not be possible, but the energy used to provide an assessment of my life could've been spent in an explanation of the procedure.
I am pregnant and I consulted reetu mam for my pregnency. I don't know the exact reason, i got aborted in the 5th month
